dcterms:creator: Jean-Philippe Bernardy
Adam Ek
Vladislav Maraev
dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset generated for testing transformer models' ability to learn nested structures. Consists of strings with nested parentheses, generated using a random walk on a grid to ensure valid nesting. Controls maximum distance and depth by discarding strings that exceed certain thresholds.
dcterms:title: Nested Parentheses Dataset
